verses.roman:
ādau tumi śuna, yadi tomāra mana māne
pāche mahāprabhure tabe karāimu śravaṇe

synonyms: ādau—in the beginning; tumi—you; śuna—hear; yadi—if; tomāra mana māne—you accept; pāche—thereafter; mahāprabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tabe—then; karāimu śravaṇe—I shall request to hear.
translation: "First you hear it, and if it is acceptable to your mind, I shall request Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to hear it."
